blog.title: Updates to the website
blog.description: I explore my website's evolution over 6 months, from minimal CSS to Panda CSS and Copilot refactoring. See how modern tools dramatically boost development productivity.

prevBlog.title: Generating AI images, paying anonymously and little
prevBlog.description: I implement anonymous micro-payments for AI image generation using Ethereum Layer-2. See how to connect blockchain payments with serverless AI for sustainable, privacy-focused services.

nextBlog.title: A gallery of AI images
nextBlog.description: I build an NFT gallery for AI-generated images using ERC-721 Enumerable contracts. Learn how to upgrade smart contracts and create integrated user experiences for collectibles.
